website_summaries.verdict: The Sony SRS-BTV5 wireless Bluetooth speaker boasts speakerphone and (iffy) NFC capabilities, but it doesn't beat the competition for the price.
pros: The Sony SRS-BTV5 is a sleek and compact ball-shaped wireless Bluetooth speaker that offers a good feature set, including a built-in rechargeable battery, speakerphone capabilities, an auxiliary input, and NFC one-touch tap-to-pair technology
cons: In terms of sound it fails to distinguish itself from the pack, and the NFC technology proved problematic

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Daughter and she really loves it. It was very easy to set up and because she has the IPhone 5 there was no need to go and download the app in the directions. She turned on her Bluetooth and it connected right out of the box. When it arrived I was not too sure about the size of it and was worried about the sound that would come out of it but his little speaker has amazing! sound that's clear and crisp. Great product.
